title: Blinken says US to share info on alleged spy balloon with allies

title: Suspect in Texas anti-immigrant shooting changes plea to guilty
description: Patrick Crusius faces hate crime charges for a mass shooting in the US city of El Paso in 2019 that killed 23 people.

title: Hope fades in Turkey, Syria with time running out on the buried
description: With the possibility of finding victims alive fading fast, survivors express frustration over the slow rescue effort.

title: Is politics hampering the delivery of aid to Syria after quakes?
description: Damascus says it should control aid and rescue efforts amid widespread devastation.

title: US has questions to answer over Nord Stream blasts, Russia says
description: Comments by foreign ministry come after a story alleges the US military was behind Nord Steam pipeline attacks.

title: Google shares tank 8% as AI chatbot Bard flubs answer in ad
description: Shares of Google's parent company lost more than $100bn after its Bard chatbot ad showed inaccurate information.

title: Brazil launches raids to oust illegal miners from Indigenous land
description: Yanomami Indigenous leaders in Brazil's Amazon blame illegal gold miners for a health crisis and surge in violence.

description: In northwestern Syria, civil defence teams are working round the clock to save people trapped under earthquake debris.

description: The Turkish city of Antakya, in Hatay, has emerged as one of the worst hit after Monday's earthquake.

title: Nigeria’s Supreme Court suspends Friday deadline for cash swap

title: For Palestine, justice is not a question of law

title: South Korea parliament votes to impeach minister over crowd crush

title: How to donate to Turkey and Syria earthquake disaster response

description: Tehran and Moscow have shown serious political will to expand economic ties, but challenges remain.

description: Moscow is seeking to expand its influence in Africa as a diplomatic tug-of-war between global powers continues.
